content: this easy pattern designed for one cake of self-striping yarn makes a lovely gift for people of all ages and genders wear it knotted like a scarf or draped like a wrap it s a beginner-friendly project with a relaxing two-row repeat requires only chain and double_crochet stitches in us terms yarn about 590 yards 540 meters of dk weight yarn light category 3 the sample scarf used 1 cake of lion brand mandala yarn 100% acrylic 590 yards 450 m per 150-gram cake in the colorway mothra you can use any yarn you like use the hook size recommended on the label you can use scraps if you prefer go with the flow of color changes- no cutting or controlling of colors needed 5 mm hook share your scarf with **#uplifterscarf** on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as uplifter crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry thank you for your support
